com.revolsys.gis.parallel

Class RecordStoreUpdateProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.parallel.process.AbstractProcess
      • com.revolsys.parallel.process.AbstractInProcess<T>
        • com.revolsys.parallel.process.BaseInProcess<Record>
          • com.revolsys.gis.parallel.RecordStoreUpdateProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InProcess<Record>, Process, Runnable, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class RecordStoreUpdateProcess
extends BaseInProcess<Record>

    The RecordStoreUpdateProcess process reads each object from the input channel and updates the object in the record store based on the object's state.

    The following actions will be performed based on the state of the object.

    New
    Insert the object into the record store.
    Persisted
    No action performed.
    Modified
    Update the object in the record store.
    Deleted
    Delete the object from the record store.
